trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Baltimore
There was one other sighting in Baltimore on or around April 15th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthis has been going on for about 2 weeks, every night except for one. it appears to be small and cylindric. usually it's yellow but sometimes i'll see a flash of red. it can move fast but usually it's still unless i move then it moves to follow i guess.if i wave at it or throw up the peace sign it moves in it's general area and flashes. last night 4\15\09 there was also a smaller cylindric object that moved and hovered right above the phone lines in my vacinity. it flashed red and one or two other colors. it also seemed to make a hardly audible noise that kind of sounded like morris code coming in. i'm not saying it was morris code, that's just what it sounded like. i've also seen a few triangles, i think. but i am positive about the rest. interesting note, he first time i saw it about an hour after it appeared there was two military aircraft first making circular patterns ever closer to it then they crossed each others path in a grid like fashion getting closer to it each time. when they got close enough they would turn of their lights. there was also 1 stealth type plane that came into play 40 minutes after the other 2 aircrafts had already been there observing it. a neighbor saw all of this too. i just want someone to believe me and send a team here. you won't be dissapointed.
Object Shape: Circle, Fireball, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
